channel.title: Shop says it currently costs points but it costs GP [HELP]
channel.description:
Hey, The shop says it currently costs points but it costs GP I added the shop myself I just put the code in actionhandler now it is saying it currently costs 0 points when it costs GP. Please help me fix this as my players annoy the f*** out of me because of some bugs. And I don't want to get rude to them as they will quit and my server population is quite low.
Thanks, Mr Rushed

item.title: Shop says it currently costs points but it costs GP [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Mr Rushed:

No, I think you misunderstood it is supposed to say this item currently cost blahblah coins but it doesn’t how do I get it to say that?

ohhhhh. Lemme get it

Example.

if (c.myShopId == 15) { c.sendMessage("This item current costs " + c.getItems().getUntradePrice(removeId) + " coins."); return; }

Read full topic

shopAssistant.java

search for “case”

heres an example

case ITEM ID: return POINTS AMOUNT;
